reviewText: Density of gold is more than 19 x water. That means granny would have weighed about a ton.

Not bad.  Essentially a kid who lives with his ill grandmother meets a witch that gives him 1 wish with the knowledge that the wish cannot be undone.  In order to help his grandma pay the bills he wishes for the Midas Touch or whatever he touches literally turns into gold.  What could go wrong?  This movie is free with Amazon Prime so I think it is worth a look if you like movies of this type.  If 'Saw' is what you typically watch then you probably should steer away from this movie.
This movie was different than what I expected but I enjoyed it.  The story and acting was very good and I'll watch it again many time.
